statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_name, sentiment_score FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback_count FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_feedback_count > 3 ORDER BY total_feedback_count DESC
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_sentiment_score FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_sentiment_score FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT theme_name, feedback_id FROM feedback_themes WHERE theme_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, date_submitted FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY date_submitted DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, theme_name FROM feedback_themes ORDER BY theme_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY date_submitted DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, date_submitted FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id > 100 AND feedback_text LIKE 'Great%' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT c.feedback_text, c.date_submitted, t.theme_name FROM customer_feedback c JOIN feedback_themes t ON c.feedback_id = t.feedback_id WHERE t.theme_name = 'Service' ORDER BY c.date_submitted DESC;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.feedback_text, t.theme_name FROM customer_feedback c LEFT JOIN feedback_themes t ON c.feedback_id = t.feedback_id WHERE t.theme_name IS NULL;
SELECT MAX(feedback_id) AS max_feedback_id, MIN(customer_id) AS min_customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedbacks WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedbacks ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedbacks WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 201;
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_analysis, keyword_analysis FROM feedback_analysis;
SELECT * FROM feedback_analysis
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customer_profiles
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedbacks WHERE customer_id = 1234
SELECT analysis_date, keyword_analysis FROM feedback_analysis WHERE sentiment_analysis = 'positive' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, theme_name, theme_description FROM feedback_themes JOIN comment_themes ON feedback_themes.theme_id = comment_themes.theme_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_location = 'New York';
SELECT theme_name, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM feedback_themes JOIN comment_themes ON feedback_themes.theme_id = comment_themes.theme_id GROUP BY theme_name;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE customer_location = 'New York'
SELECT theme_name, theme_description FROM comment_themes WHERE LENGTH(theme_description) > 50
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_data JOIN customer_feedback ON customer_data.customer_id = customer_feedback.customer_id WHERE rating < 3

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, feedback_text FROM customer_data JOIN customer_feedback ON customer_data.customer_id = customer_feedback.customer_id JOIN feedback_themes ON customer_feedback.customer_id = feedback_themes.feedback_id
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback
SELECT customer_id, feedback, rating FROM customer_feedback
SELECT sentiment_label, sentiment_score FROM customer_sentiments ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT topic_name, topic_keywords FROM feedback_topics WHERE topic_id = 3
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender='Female'
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY customer_id DESC, rating ASC
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT topic_name, topic_keywords FROM feedback_topics WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(topic_keywords) > 20
SELECT MAX(age) AS oldest_customer_age, MIN(age) AS youngest_customer_age FROM customer_demographics
SELECT * FROM customer_sentiments WHERE sentiment_label = 'positive' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
